DataElement.preferredName: FDA Adverse Event Expedited Report Submission Result Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Submission of expedited notification that a subject has experienced an adverse event to the Food and Drug Administration (FDA)._A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: FDA Adverse Event Expedited Report Submission
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Submission of expedited notification that a subject has experienced an adverse event to the Food and Drug Administration (FDA).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: One of the agencies of the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services. It assures the safety of foods and cosmetics, and the safety and efficacy of pharmaceuticals, biological products, radiation emitting products, medical devices, and also, animal feed and drugs.

Concepts.definition: One of the agencies of the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services. It assures the safety of foods and cosmetics, and the safety and efficacy of pharmaceuticals, biological products, radiation emitting products, medical devices, and also, animal feed and drugs.

Property.preferredName: Adverse Drug Experience Reporting System Submission
Property.preferredDefinition: A Web application developed for the electronic submission of Expedited Reports to the NCI for serious and/or unexpected Adverse Events, deaths, and other events defined in the NCI Guidelines: Adverse Event Reporting Requirements for NCI Investigational Agents:Submission; a message submitted for the judgment of others.

Concepts.definition: A Web application developed for the electronic submission of Expedited Reports to the NCI for serious and/or unexpected Adverse Events, deaths, and other events defined in the NCI Guidelines: Adverse Event Reporting Requirements for NCI Investigational Agents
Something submitted for the judgment or consideration of others.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Food and Drug Administration Assessment Result Category
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not in accordance with the fact or reality or definitive criteria.

Concepts.definition: Not in accordance with facts, reality or definitive criteria.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Conforming to fact or reality or definitive criteria.

Concepts.definition: Conforming to facts, reality or definitive criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Category; used informally to mean a class of things.

Concepts.definition: A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.
